meta.article_title: October 12, 2020 - Don't Telegraph the Direction of Your Attack

dont_telegraph_direction_attack.diagnostic: Opponent senses the direction of attack even if not consciously aware of specific differences in stroke.

debutant.step: Keep shots identical as long as possible before committing to a direction

exercices_complementaires.description: Set up for a forehand shot and at the last second, whip the shoulders around to go in the opposite direction. Repeat on backhand.
